data.lyric:
[ti:Pull Me Up]
[ar:张靓颖]
[al:Pull Me Up]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Pull Me Up - 张靓颖 (Jane Zhang)
[00:01.82]Written by：Jack Brady/Jordan Roman
[00:03.65]Produced by：Harvey Mason Jr./The Wavys
[00:05.48]Recorded by：Andrew Hey
[00:07.30]Assisted by：Aaron Berton
[00:09.13]Paradise
[00:12.33]Feels like diamonds in disguise
[00:15.77]Don't think twice think right
[00:22.35]A perfect crime
[00:25.47]You stole my heart in record time
[00:28.86]Left behind no sign
[00:34.65]So play me like a string up on a violin
[00:37.73]I know it sounds so sad but it feels so good
[00:41.24]Got me locked inside your love without tryin'
[00:44.30]Like ohhh
[00:47.94]So take me to your heaven like I'm dyin'
[00:50.86]Cause I would leave this place only if you stood
[00:54.32]Right beside me on the edge of the horizon
[00:57.46]Like ohhh
[01:00.78]So pull me up
[01:04.06]So pull me up
[01:07.31]Baby when the sun goes down
[01:10.42]I'll be waiting for you on the Ground
[01:14.07]So pull me up
[01:17.29]So pull me up
[01:20.57]Baby when the sun goes down
[01:23.67]I'll be waiting for you on the Ground
[01:27.26]So pull me up
[01:28.56]Hypnotized
[01:31.73]Feels like crystals when I cry
[01:35.05]I don't mind
[01:36.93]Don't mind
[01:41.74]Fantasized
[01:44.04]About your body rising next to mine
[01:48.20]Feels so nice
[01:50.04]So nice
[01:54.12]So play me like a string up on a violin
[01:57.10]I know it sounds so sad but it feels so good
